thread.title: Celebrity Big Brother star Austin Armacost finally reveals the real reason he hates Speidi
thread.title_full: Celebrity Big Brother star Austin Armacost finally reveals the real reason he hates Speidi

author: Nicola Agius
title: Celebrity Big Brother star Austin Armacost finally reveals the real reason he hates Speidi
text:
Celebrity Big Brother star Austin Armacost finally reveals the real reason he hates Speidi The US hunk confessed he disliked Heidi and Spencer Pratt before he even entered the CBB house Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Austin Armacost confesses 'I have an issue with drinking' Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Austin Armacost has made no secret of his hatred for Speidi. 
In tonight's episode of Celebrity Big Brother , he finally reveals the real reason he cannot stand Heidi and Spencer Pratt. 
During a heart-to-heart with Nicole McLean, he reveals he first met the couple when he was at a party in LA with his ex-boyfriend Marc Jacobs. 
He says: "We’re outside smoking and Heidi came over to Marc, and was like 'I love you and I think you’re amazing!' She didn’t even acknowledge me, and she walked away and I said 'Oh and my name is Austin b*tch!' In tonight's episode of Celebrity Big Brother, Austin Armacost finally reveals the real reason he cannot stand Heidi and Spencer Pratt (Photo: Channel 5) 
"And then Spencer heard me call her a bitch and came over…" Read More 
Unsurprisingly, Austin isn't exactly quiet while having this conversation and Spencer overhears the whole thing. 
The Hills star then marches over to him and Nicola and accuses the star of lying. 
Spencer snaps: "This never happened! This manifested in your brain. Happened in your mind! It’s a made up story." Is Austin telling the truth? (Photo: Channel 5) 
Adamant on standing his ground, Austin then shouts back, telling the reality hunk that it wasn't an "imaginary story". 
But Spencer refuses to let the matter drop and tells his fellow American housemate, "I'm back to f**king hating you". 
*Celebrity Big Brother returns to Channel 5 tonight at 9pm Like us on Facebook
